attributes.action: Teresa may to resign as prime minister
attributes.background: She clearly showing this by not condemning donald trumps racist and absurd policies on women, race and religeons, we (the british) do not support any of these actions and our PRIME minister representing britain should definately without a doubt should have condemned this

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178727
